channel.title: [Delta] SideIcon redstone
channel.description: When I click on the sidebar tab the one right of the emotes tab, it doesn't show the redstone. How can I fix this?

item.title: [Delta] SideIcon redstone
item.dc:creator: @Team_Rocket Team_Rocket
item.description:
@Team_Rocket wrote:

[quote=“gangsta tony, post:5, topic:450090”][quote author=Team_Rocket link=topic=552985.msg4051903#msg4051903 date=1342590455]

It doesn’t show the red-stone or tab? Pull the red-stone out of another Client and implement it into yours. If you’re having trouble with the tab showing up, since you’re using Delta, look under your Initialize method. It should list the tabs loaded.

I have the red-stone but like for the one on the right of the emotes tab, it doesn’t show the red-stone when I click on it but it shows the red-stone when I click on any other tab.

Check what I said about your Initialize method, It’s in your Client class server-sided. It should load up the tabs before it checks for the Starter.
[/quote]
It shows the interface on the tab, it just doesn’t show the redstone when I click the tab.[/quote]

Doesn’t that tell you something?

Read full topic
